mapper.select: select id, date_updated as dateUpdated from users where is_deleted = false
select id, date_updated as dateUpdated from users where id = #{id} and is_deleted = false
mapper.insert: insert into users (id, date_updated, role) values (#{id}, now(), #{role.name})
mapper.update: update users set is_deleted = true, date_updated = now() where id = #{id}
